thread.title: 'I Apologize' For Iraq 'Mistakes' -- But Not For Invading
thread.title_full: 'I Apologize' For Iraq 'Mistakes' -- But Not For Invading - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: 'I Apologize' For Iraq 'Mistakes' -- But Not For Invading
text: ImageContent(562c6c66e4b0443bb56434cd,562c6b5d140000e800c7ac44,Image,HectorAssetUrl(562c6b5d140000e800c7ac44.jpeg,Some(),Some(jpeg)),ASSOCIATED PRESS,) "I can say that I apologize for the fact that the intelligence we received was wrong because, even though he had used chemical weapons extensively against his own people, against others, the program in the form that we thought it was did not exist in the way that we thought," Blair said in an exclusive interview on CNN's Fareed Zakaria GPS that airs Sunday. -- This feed and its contents are the property of The Huffington Post, and use is subject to our terms. It may be used for personal consumption, but may not be distributed on a website. ...
